text:
extra things to consider :slightly_smiling_face::

add more fields to manage more filters (as default content in the template):
- type
- language
- pathPrefix
- length
- limit

Also consider add all of those (and even more like the offset) as default hidden empty inputs in the default form, because if in the result page you do another query, all of the extra parameter I can use are removed and not auto-populated from the Query variable. (I had to manage by my own)
Thanks for the feedback <@U7ADCU3BM> ! Our goal is to keep the module pretty basic, but make sure that it is easily extendable by developers who want to clone it and make their own

hmm, it doesn't look like the good way to go.
If you update the module I won't get the last updates then, I had to be checking what are you updating and apply to my custom :disappointed:

just for the records:
The customizations are not like something fancy I want to do, but to make it workable with multilingual portals.
